union_right_iff:
@[simp]
theorem union_right_iff : ae_disjoint μ s (t ∪ u) ↔ ae_disjoint μ s t ∧ ae_disjoint μ s u := by
  simp [union_eq_Union, and_comm]
#align union_right_iff union_right_iff
union_right:
theorem union_right (ht : ae_disjoint μ s t) (hu : ae_disjoint μ s u) : ae_disjoint μ s (t ∪ u) :=
  union_right_iff.2 ⟨ht, hu⟩
#align union_right union_right
union_left_iff:
@[simp]
theorem union_left_iff : ae_disjoint μ (s ∪ t) u ↔ ae_disjoint μ s u ∧ ae_disjoint μ t u := by
  simp [union_eq_Union, and_comm]
#align union_left_iff union_left_iff
union_left:
theorem union_left (hs : ae_disjoint μ s u) (ht : ae_disjoint μ t u) : ae_disjoint μ (s ∪ t) u :=
  union_left_iff.mpr ⟨hs, ht⟩
#align union_left union_left
symmetric:
protected theorem symmetric : symmetric (ae_disjoint μ) := fun s t h => h.symm
#align symmetric symmetric
symm:
#print symm /-
@[symm]
protected theorem symm (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : ae_disjoint μ t s := by rwa [ae_disjoint, inter_comm]
#align symm symm
-/
of_null_right:
theorem of_null_right (h : μ t = 0) : ae_disjoint μ s t :=
  measure_mono_null (inter_subset_right _ _) h
#align of_null_right of_null_right
of_null_left:
theorem of_null_left (h : μ s = 0) : ae_disjoint μ s t :=
  (of_null_right h).symm
#align of_null_left of_null_left
mono_ae:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem mono_ae (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) (hu : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » u μ s) (hv : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » v μ t) : ae_disjoint μ u v :=
  measure_mono_null_ae (hu.inter hv) h
#align mono_ae mono_ae
mono:
protected theorem mono (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) (hu : u ⊆ s) (hv : v ⊆ t) : ae_disjoint μ u v :=
  h.mono_ae hu.eventually_le hv.eventually_le
#align mono mono
measure_diff_right:
theorem measure_diff_right (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : μ (t \ s) = μ t :=
  measure_congr h.diff_ae_eq_right
#align measure_diff_right measure_diff_right
measure_diff_left:
theorem measure_diff_left (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : μ (s \ t) = μ s :=
  measure_congr h.diff_ae_eq_left
#align measure_diff_left measure_diff_left
exists_null_pairwise_disjoint_diff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr on » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr on » -/

Authors: Yury Kudryashov

/-- If `s : ι → set α` is a countable family of pairwise a.e. disjoint sets, then there exists a
family of measurable null sets `t i` such that `s i \ t i` are pairwise disjoint. -/
theorem exists_null_pairwise_disjoint_diff [countable ι] {s : ι → set α}
    (hd : Pairwise («expr on » (ae_disjoint μ) s)) :
    ∃ t : ι → set α,
      (∀ i, measurable_set (t i)) ∧ (∀ i, μ (t i) = 0) ∧ Pairwise («expr on » Disjoint fun i => s i \ t i) :=
  by
  refine'
    ⟨fun i =>
      to_measurable μ
        (s i ∩ «expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (s j)),
      fun i => measurable_set_to_measurable _ _, fun i => _, _⟩
  · simp only [measure_to_measurable, inter_Union]
    exact (measure_bUnion_null_iff <| to_countable _).2 fun j hj => hd (ne.symm hj)
  · simp only [Pairwise, disjoint_left, on_fun, mem_diff, not_and, and_imp, not_not]
    intro i j hne x hi hU hj
    replace hU :
      x ∉ s i ∩ «expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (s j) :=
      fun h => hU (subset_to_measurable _ _ h)
    simp only [mem_inter_iff, mem_Union, not_and, not_exists] at hU
    exact (hU hi j hne.symm hj).elim
#align exists_null_pairwise_disjoint_diff exists_null_pairwise_disjoint_diff
exists_disjoint_diff:
/-- If `s` and `t` are `μ`-a.e. disjoint, then `s \ u` and `t` are disjoint for some measurable null
set `u`. -/
theorem exists_disjoint_diff (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : ∃ u, measurable_set u ∧ μ u = 0 ∧ Disjoint (s \ u) t :=
  ⟨to_measurable μ (s ∩ t), measurable_set_to_measurable _ _, (measure_to_measurable _).trans h,
    disjoint_sdiff_self_left.mono_left fun x hx => ⟨hx.1, fun hxt => hx.2 <| subset_to_measurable _ _ ⟨hx.1, hxt⟩⟩⟩
#align exists_disjoint_diff exists_disjoint_diff
eq:
protected theorem eq (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : μ (s ∩ t) = 0 :=
  h
#align eq eq
diff_ae_eq_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem diff_ae_eq_right (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » (t \ s : set α) μ t :=
  h.symm.diff_ae_eq_left
#align diff_ae_eq_right diff_ae_eq_right
diff_ae_eq_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem diff_ae_eq_left (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » (s \ t : set α) μ s :=
  @diff_self_inter _ s t ▸ diff_null_ae_eq_self h
#align diff_ae_eq_left diff_ae_eq_left
congr:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
#print congr /-
protected theorem congr (h : ae_disjoint μ s t) (hu : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » u μ s) (hv : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » v μ t) :
    ae_disjoint μ u v :=
  h.mono_ae (filter.eventually_eq.le hu) (filter.eventually_eq.le hv)
#align congr congr
-/
comm:
#print comm /-
protected theorem comm : ae_disjoint μ s t ↔ ae_disjoint μ t s :=
  ⟨fun h => h.symm, fun h => h.symm⟩
#align comm comm
-/
ae_disjoint_compl_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem ae_disjoint_compl_right : ae_disjoint μ s («expr ᶜ» s) :=
  (@disjoint_compl_right _ _ s).ae_disjoint
#align ae_disjoint_compl_right ae_disjoint_compl_right
ae_disjoint_compl_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem ae_disjoint_compl_left : ae_disjoint μ («expr ᶜ» s) s :=
  (@disjoint_compl_left _ _ s).ae_disjoint
#align ae_disjoint_compl_left ae_disjoint_compl_left
ae_disjoint:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr on » -/
protected theorem _root_.set.pairwise_disjoint.ae_disjoint {f : ι → set α} {s : set ι} (hf : s.pairwise_disjoint f) :
    s.pairwise («expr on » (ae_disjoint μ) f) :=
  hf.mono' fun i j h => h.ae_disjoint
#align set.pairwise_disjoint.ae_disjoint set.pairwise_disjoint.ae_disjoint
Union_right_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
@[simp]
theorem Union_right_iff [countable ι] {t : ι → set α} :
    ae_disjoint μ s
        («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (t i)) ↔
      ∀ i, ae_disjoint μ s (t i) :=
  by simp only [ae_disjoint, inter_Union, measure_Union_null_iff]
#align Union_right_iff Union_right_iff
Union_left_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
@[simp]
theorem Union_left_iff [countable ι] {s : ι → set α} :
    ae_disjoint μ
        («expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (s i)) t ↔
      ∀ i, ae_disjoint μ (s i) t :=
  by simp only [ae_disjoint, Union_inter, measure_Union_null_iff]
#align Union_left_iff Union_left_iff
